column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Riding on a train is a great way to commute , especially when frequenting a city !
#text=It 's a great reminder of transportation of the past , and a great way to spend an afternoon .
#text=A specific example would be when I frequent the great city of Boston .
#text=I always choose to take the train in , as driving into the big city can be a great hassle .
#text=In this day and age it 's convenient to look up train times ahead of time on the appropriate website .
#text=Once you determine the train that you will take you will need to find transportation to the train stop , either by walking , bus , or getting dropped off .
#text=Once at the train station go up to the ticket window or use a handy kiosk to purchase your ticket .
#text=Take this ticket and head through the checkpoint , or if you are using a commuter rail bring it with you to give to the train attendant .
#text=As you start moving and stopping they will announce each stop .
#text=Wait until your stop has approached and exit the train .
